text: 'iin la tanfiruu 'ayuha almuminun 'iilaa qital eaduakum ynzl allah euqubatah bikima, wayat biqawm akharin yunfirun 'iidh a astunfru, wayutieun allah warasulaha, walan taduruu allah shyyana btwllikm ean aljahadi, fahu alghaniu eankum wa'antum alfuqara' 'iilayha. wama yuriduh allah yakun la muhalata. wallah ealaa kuli shay' qadir min nasr dinih wanabih dunukam
